ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | #P_pire | |- _pi e. RR |

| 8 |  | #P_lt0neg2 | |- ( _pi e. RR -> ( 0 < _pi <-> -u _pi < 0 ) ) |

| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_mpbi | |- -u _pi < 0 |

| 12 |  | #P_0re | |- 0 e. RR |

| 14 | 13 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( -u _pi e. RR* /\ _pi e. RR ) -> 0 <_ _pi ) |
| 15 |  | #P_elioc2 | |- ( ( -u _pi e. RR* /\ _pi e. RR ) -> ( 0 e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) <-> ( 0 e. RR /\ -u _pi < 0 /\ 0 <_ _pi ) ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 11, 14, 15 | #P_mpbir3and | |- ( ( -u _pi e. RR* /\ _pi e. RR ) -> 0 e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) ) |
| 17 | 6, 1, 16 | #P_mp2an | |- 0 e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) |

| 19 | 5, 12, 1 | #P_lttri | |- ( ( -u _pi < 0 /\ 0 < _pi ) -> -u _pi < _pi ) |
| 20 | 10, 2, 19 | #P_mp2an | |- -u _pi < _pi |
| 21 | 20 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( -u _pi e. RR* /\ _pi e. RR ) -> -u _pi < _pi ) |
| 22 | 1 | #P_leidi | |- _pi <_ _pi |

| 24 |  | #P_elioc2 | |- ( ( -u _pi e. RR* /\ _pi e. RR ) -> ( _pi e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) <-> ( _pi e. RR /\ -u _pi < _pi /\ _pi <_ _pi ) ) ) |
| 25 | 18, 21, 23, 24 | #P_mpbir3and | |- ( ( -u _pi e. RR* /\ _pi e. RR ) -> _pi e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) ) |

| 27 |  | #P_bj-inftyexpiinj | |- ( ( 0 e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) /\ _pi e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) ) -> ( 0 = _pi <-> ( inftyexpi ` 0 ) = ( inftyexpi ` _pi ) ) ) |
| 28 | 17, 26, 27 | #P_mp2an | |- ( 0 = _pi <-> ( inftyexpi ` 0 ) = ( inftyexpi ` _pi ) ) |
| 29 | 4, 28 | #P_mtbi | |- -. ( inftyexpi ` 0 ) = ( inftyexpi ` _pi ) |
| 30 |  | #P_df-bj-minfty | |- minfty = ( inftyexpi ` _pi ) |
| 31 | 30 | #P_eqeq2i | |- ( ( inftyexpi ` 0 ) = minfty <-> ( inftyexpi ` 0 ) = ( inftyexpi ` _pi ) ) |

| 33 |  | #P_df-bj-pinfty | |- pinfty = ( inftyexpi ` 0 ) |

| 35 | 32, 34 | #P_mtbir | |- -. pinfty = minfty |
| 36 | 35 | #P_neir | |- pinfty =/= minfty |
